original_text: Jesus arrived at the grave where they had put Lazarus's dead body. It was a cave. A large stone covered the front of the hole. Again, Jesus felt very upset.
korean_text: 이에 예수께서 다시 속으로 비통히 여기시며 무덤에 가시니 무덤이 굴이라 돌로 막았거늘

sentences.original_text: where they had put Lazarus's dead body
A large stone covered the front of the hole
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 돌이 구멍 앞을 덮고 있었다
